title: A Family talks about sex
creator_credit: Wexler Film Productions, E C Brown Foundation and Larry Yust
brief_description: Deals with situations parents face in giving their children guidance and information about sex. Emphasises that if the parent-child relationship is based on love, respect and trust, then there is reason to hope that the children will make responsible decisions about sex.
